mapper.insert: insert into ATTEND_MANAGER_T (attend_no, empno, attend_date, attend_code, attend_time, attend_m_etc, attend_open, attend_close) values(#{attend_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attend_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{attend_code, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attend_time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attend_m_etc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attend_open, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attend_close, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
